casebody.data:
Marie A. HUDSON, Respondent,
v.
Edwin K. HUDSON, Appellant. WD 80661 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: MARCH 20, 2018 Anita I Rodarte ; Lee's Summit, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Allen S. Russell, Kansas City, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Before Division Two: James Edward Welsh, Presiding Judge, Alok Ahuja, Judge, Anthony Rex Gabbert, Judge

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Edwin Hudson appeals the circuit court's Nunc Pro Tunc Judgment and Decree of Dissolution of Marriage contending that the court abused its discretion in ordering him to pay $3,200 per month modifiable decretal maintenance and maintenance arrearage in the amount of $30,400 to Marie Hudson. We affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
